channel.title: LUG on Paul Cutler
channel.description: Recent content in LUG on Paul Cutler

item.title: Foresight Talk This Weekend
item.description: Just a reminder, I’ll be giving a talk on Foresight this Saturday in St. Paul at Penguins Unbound. It will be more of an introduction to Foresight to existing Linux users (though I hope a few folks who don’t use Linux are there), and I’ll have some install discs to give out. The meeting starts at 10:00 a.m., hit the link above for directions. See you there!
